pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro mahāmatto pavāsaṃ gacchanto bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.1.7: Atha kho so mahāmatto ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.1.8: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā mayā dūte pahite nāgacchissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.1.11: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassa mahāmattassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.1.12: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.1.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.2.5: Addasa kho āyasmā ānando senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto tāni cīvarāni cīvaravaṃse bhaṇḍikābaddhāni tiṭṭhante disvā bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.2.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa yathānikkhittaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.2.11: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.2.12: Atha kho āyasmā ānando te bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi …pe…—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.2.13: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.2.16: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.2.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.2.19: “Dasāhānāgataṃ kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamaṃ bhikkhuno paneva accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya, accekaṃ maññamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paṭiggahetvā yāva cīvarakālasamayaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:1.2.20: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.6: senāya vā gantukāmo hoti, pavāsaṃ vā gantukāmo hoti, gilāno vā hoti, gabbhinī vā hoti, assaddhassa vā saddhā uppannā hoti, appasannassa vā pasādo uppanno hoti, so ce bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pahiṇeyya— “āgacchantu bhadantā vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī”ti, etaṃ accekacīvaraṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.7: Accekaṃ maññamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbaṃ paṭiggahetvā yāva cīvarakālasamayaṃ nikkhipitabbanti
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.13: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimaṃ divasaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.14: Atthate kathine kathinuddhāradivasaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.15: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.18: idaṃ me, bhante, accekacīvaraṃ cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.23: Accekacīvare accekacīvarasaññī cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.24: Accekacīvare vematiko cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.25: Accekacīvare anaccekacīvarasaññī cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.32: avilutte viluttasaññī cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.33: Nissaggiyaṃ cīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.38: antosamaye adhiṭṭheti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, ḍayhati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti,
